name: The name of the Pokemon. This is shown at the top, with capitalization preserved.
evolvesFrom: The name of the Pokemon this Pokemon evolves from. A png (in preEvolutionArt) is loaded from this field (all lowercase), but the text capitalization is preserved.
type: The type of this Pokemon. Does not support dual-typing.
image: The name of the png in cardArt to load. Converted to all lowercase.

passive.name: The name of the passive.
passive.type: ability: The most permissive. poke-body: Only one instance of this Pokemon. poke-power: Only if this Pokemon is active.

attacks.name: The name of an attack.
attacks.cost: The cost, in space-separated types. Supports dual-typing.
attacks.effect: The optional effect of the attack.

weakness.type: The optional type of this Pokemon's weakness. Does not support dual-typing.

resistance.type: The optional type of this Pokemon's resistance. Does not support dual-typing.

flavor: Flavor text. This is displayed at the bottom of the card. Have fun with it! Accents and apostrophes are particular, so make sure you're using the right stuff.
